column3: Changed the variable name and added a comment in response to Petertodd's comments, also avoided the nested if per jonasschnelli's comments.\n
Can one of the admins verify this patch?\n
wouldn't `if (mempool.lookup(inv.hash, tx, textile) && txtime <= pfrom->timeLastMempool) {` also work?\n
Indeed, current layout is an artifact of my local copy having an else for logging.\n
Please extend the comment here, e.g. Last time of mempool BIP35 request?\n
Have you considered adding `int64_t& time` to the previous `lookup`? Both functions are almost the same...\n
